title: Ticket #6602: master fails in docker when DISCARD_SESSION_KEYRING_ON_STARTUP true
description:
On startup, the master calls KEYCTL_JOB_SESSION_KEYRING, to create a new empty keyring, and discard any existing one. This system call requires priviliges which most docker containers do not have.

After talking with Zach, we should make this failure non-fatal. It confuses administrators, who universally decide to turn off the keyring knob.
